description: Many challenges posed by an island-wide election were "effectively dealt" with, observers report.
title: Guernsey Election 2020: Island-wide vote 'successful'
title_page: Guernsey Election 2020: Island-wide vote 'successful' - BBC News
maintext: "The first time election observers were invited by Guernsey; the first use of a new electoral system; the first inclusion of advance polling days; and, on top of all this, the first election to be conducted during a global pandemic.
